text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: It's the ocean!
At Summer Training Camp, Fine Motion was energetically jumping up and down, excited from being at the beach.
choice_data_list: Is this your first time at the beach…?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: No, that's not the case. But, it's the first time I've been together with everyone… really, it's like a dream come true.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufu, but the feeling of stepping barefoot through the sand like this, just about everything about it… makes me feel like this is special.
choice_data_list: It's fine to enjoy it to the fullest.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yeah! -Ah! Hermit crab spotted! I wonder if it's looking for a new home?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Alright! Maybe I'll lend it a hand. Somewhere on this beach there has to the perfect new home-

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text: Alrighty then, let's start training on the beach… Wait, huh? Where's Fine?

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text: Ah, she's over there! Maybe she's already started?! Everyone, follow Fine!
Fine Motion was definitely enjoying herself, however, time flies when you're having fun-
Last Night of Training Camp. I went to the Summer Festival held nearby together with Fine Motion.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Mmmm, It was delicious! So that's cotton candy… that's what cotton candy tastes like. It really did melt instantly when I put it in my mouth.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Fufu. Training, playing, cooking, adventures, spooky stories, and finally a festival… it was a training camp filled with wonderful events, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Oh! Fireworks!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Beautiful… aren't they?…

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Special things, fun things, they're very much like fireworks, huh? They're beautiful, but over before you know it.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: But, it's precisely because they're so fleeting, that they remain as such beautiful memories in our hearts… Don't you think-?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Ah, sorry! It's a festival after all, and there I go talking about something so serious.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Alright, how about we go check out the stalls? I found a sign over there for "Super Jumbo Takoyaki"-
And so, I accompanied Fine Motion at the festival for a while… Thus, this year's summer training camp ended without incident.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Fuuu! Today's training is over. After being away for a while, the school's course somehow has a fresh feeling to it.
choice_data_list: It feels like we've returned to our normal days
It feels like we've returned to our normal days

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yeah… but you never know when another sudden surprise might happen, you know?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, no way that's happening…But, it'd be nice if there really was something special waiting for us. Like another lost cat.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Aw, nothing happened. Though I guess it would be troublesome if we kept finding lost cats. Ahaha.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Huh? This is… instant ramen? It wasn't here before, was it?
Now that I think about it… after the previous incident I tidied up, and must have left this ramen out. It was originally meant as emergency rations or a snack.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oooh! "Asura Noodles the Third"…! It's a brand I haven't tried yet…!
choice_data_list: You can have it, if you want
You can have it, if you want

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Really?! Thank you, Trainer! Then let's promptly-
choice_data_list: I don't have any ingredients though
I don't have any ingredients though

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …huh? Don't you usually eat instant ramen without adding any extra ingredients?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: You just add something…? From the fridge…?! Does that mean, anything will work…?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Uwaaah! For some reason, I'm really excited! The ramen inspirations just won't stop!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Since we have the chance, let's buy some ingredients! Let's make an original ramen!
With that, together with Fine Motion, we headed to a supermarket in the shopping district-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: La lala, lalala-n. Bean sprouts, cabbage, maitake, minced meat, eggs~

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text: Ah, Fine! What are you up to?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, we were going to investigate the possibiltiles of instant ramen toppings, so we're out shopping for ingredients.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text: Ah, I see. Like adding meat or cabbage? We used to do that back home every now and then.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text: My dad used to put the snacks she would eat while drinking sake in. Things like salami or special roast pork, weird things like that…

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh, speaking from experience! Then, do you think you could lend us your wisdom? Let's work together, and make the best ingredient-filled ramen!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text: If we make something good, there's the possibility of becoming a Royal Family Chef… That kind of fires me up!
And so, Fine Motion's friends joined us as we continued our ingredient search-

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Let's Eat!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text: …Hmmm, Salami isn't as bad as I thought. It's kind of like a strongly seasoned pork version of cup ramen.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text: The imitation crab I put in is doing some work too! It leaves a proper… deep flavor-

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text: …You probably think it sounds cool saying something like a food reviewer.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! But this is really delicious. When I return home, maybe I should recommend it to my father and mother.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, recommend it! It's my one chance to become a Royal Family Chef, and I'll take it! Something Royalty-like!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text: As expected of you, suddenly hogging all the glory… Forget it, just eat.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yeah, eat it before the noodle get soggy! Finishing it while it's still hot is half the battle.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Yep. Definitely-it's just like that.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufu…I think I just realized something important. Thanks to all of you.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: If something special happens, of course it's wonderful- But, even if it doesn't, that's fine too.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Because just like this, spending our time together "as usual"…to me, there's nothing more "special" than that.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Fufu. Then, let's enjoy it together.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: This limited, but irreplaceable time. From now on… okay?
